definition: hardcover (book)/elaborately packaged/opposite: 簡裝|简装[jian3 zhuang1]
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: "Is the book in artistic binding?" asked Joe.
The country thrusted the hardbound room policy actually to give the building materials market to bring the new opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 国家力推精装房的政策却给建材市场带来了新商机。

sentences.english: The hard cover is on sale for the same price as the paperback this week in the bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 在书店，这些精装本与平装本价格相同。

sentences.english: Planning division of free office space and precision fitting apartment.
sentences.chinese: 规划有可自由分割的办公用房和精装修公寓住宅。

sentences.english: He wrote down and illustrated his findings in a leather-bound tome .
sentences.chinese: 他在一个皮革精装的册子了图文说明了他的发现。

sentences.english: I liked the deluxe edition, but I could afford only a second best.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢精装版，但我只买得起一本稍差一点的。

sentences.english: The project is a front book cover design for a hardback book.
sentences.chinese: 该项目是前书为精装书的封面设计。

sentences.english: How about the price of the hardcover?
I have a binding-edition Dream of the Red Chamber. Do you want to read it?
sentences.chinese: 我有一本精装版《红楼梦》，你想不想看？

sentences.english: Submit one hardbound copy and the E-file of your thesis.
sentences.chinese: 缴交毕业论文精装乙册与电子档已审核通过之检查。

sentences.english: Some of the best deals are on their hardcover books.
sentences.chinese: 一些最好的交易是他们卖的精装本书籍。

sentences.english: I would never write anything but a hard-cover book .
sentences.chinese: 除了精装书，别的任何书我都不写。

sentences.english: Hardcover. 176 pages. More than 150 full-color photos.
sentences.chinese: 精装书，176页，内有超过150张全彩色图片。

sentences.english: Walther also acquires books, will bring out in hardcover.
sentences.chinese: 而且沃尔特用精装的方式出版这本书。

sentences.english: Yes, China carries out the hardbound room, will cancel the semifinished materials room gradually.
sentences.chinese: 是的，中国推行精装房，逐步逐步地会取消毛坯房。

sentences.english: Party A consigns interior re-decoration to other parties separately.
sentences.chinese: 室内精装修设计由甲方另行委托设计。

definition: paperback/plainly packaged/opposite: 精裝|精装[jing1 zhuang1]
configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
binding and layout (of a book etc)
one bedroom and one living room
dust jacket (of a book)/protective cover/document seal
second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man
